title: Every time!!!!!!

embed.description: The battle begins, and sixteen teams across the globe are fighting towards one goal - to win the League of Legends World Championship. To kick off the start of the action, we set out to craft a war cry to rally behind. Whether you're a solo queue warrior or fighting off the LCS jitters - every moment counts.

body:
Every time i hear this song... i just feel so proud to be part of the Lol community.

and just have an insatiable urge to play one of my 3 main champs and run headlong with my friends side by side into a do or die teamfight!

...of course in reality it always ends with being buttraped by a bronze 5 Zed, four minutes into the game, and watching him stand over my lifeless corpse spamming laugh and lvl 7 mastery. 

buuuut i can still dream xD
can still imagine Azir, Sol or Taliyah charging headlong into glorious combat, with Ashe, Evelynn, Amumu, and Jhin (friends mains) by my side.

replies.body:
One of my favourite pieces =D

I need some of this hype so I can make that climb to diamond by the end of season ( not long now!)

YOU CAN DO IT.

When your done, wanna play more normal games?
Wanna finish that shurima vid now that I've moved and have a new monitor now XD

The best of luck to you! :)

Nothing is more motivational than this song and video i swear. 

Im too scared of falling out of silver, to play more ranked now :S
falling out just before the end of the season would be terrible :/
IKR!!! The nostalgia and feels are so real with this song! Me and my friends always meet up to watch worlds and trick or treat (even though its on oct 29th this year D:).
Well you won't be getting far with that dirty team comp {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
amumu has no friends. you lied.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tWuu7trU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-14T00:55:15.042+0000)
